questions.question_text: "wellness" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A state of being healthy and maintaining physical and mental well-being
questions.example_sentence: The company’s wellness program includes fitness classes and stress management workshops.
questions.explanation:
健康・心身の健康維持
ボーナス制度
出席記録
転勤計画

questions.question_text: "engagement" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Active participation or involvement in an activity
questions.example_sentence: Employee engagement in wellness activities is encouraged but voluntary.
questions.explanation:
参加・関与
契約義務
遅延
罰金

questions.question_text: "participation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of taking part in an activity or event
The act of hiring new employees
questions.example_sentence: Participation in the fitness classes is optional but recommended.
questions.explanation:
参加・関与
採用
投資額
業績評価

questions.question_text: "assessment" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of evaluating or analyzing something
questions.example_sentence: Quarterly health assessments will be provided to employees.
questions.explanation:
評価・査定
故障
会議
昇進

questions.question_text: "initiative" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A new plan or program intended to achieve a goal
questions.example_sentence: The Employee Wellness Program is a company-wide initiative to promote health.
questions.explanation:
新しい計画・取り組み
遅延
財務報告
日常業務
